document_data.name: Clan Prexijandilin
document_data.mainbody: '''Clan Prexijandilin''' was one of the [[dragonborn]] [[Thymari#Clans|clans]] of the nation of [[Tymanther]].
document_data.Description: Members of Clan Prexijandilin used enamel primroses pierced into their cheeks as their distinctive clan piercings. Females also added a few ones to the tips of their plumes.
document_data.Background: Clan Prexijandilin was considered one of the most warlike clans of Tymanther, to the point that some considered ironic that their emblem was a flower.
document_data.History:
Clan Prexijandilin had a prominent role of the defense of Tymanther during the [[invasion of Tymanther|invasion]] by the [[ash giant]]s in [[1479 DR]].

During the [[Second Sundering]], Clan Prexijandilin lost most of their lands, located to the north of [[Djerad Thymar]], when [[Abeir]] and [[Toril]] exchanged lands.
document_data.Known members:
*[[Prexijandilin Heskan]], a member of the [[Lance Defenders]] in 1487 DR.
*[[Prexijandilin Jhiri]], a member of the Lance Defenders in 1479 DR.
